bug.author: jgraving
bug.summary: Updated imports break compatibility with older versions of tensorflow
bug.description: This does seem to break compatibility with tensorflow 1.12. Downgrading to 0.3.5 (before this pull request) seems to fix this. It would be nice to have the imports change dynamically. Originally posted by @lambdaloop in #39 (comment)

comments.comment: Latest pip version should (hopefully) fix this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lambdaloop>@lambdaloop</denchmark-link> Reopen if you're still having problems.
